Installing rubim from PyPI
--------------------------

.. code-block:: python3

    pip install rubim
..


* if you have a problem with the installation, subscribe to the channel.

import rubim
===================

.. code-block:: python3

    from rubim import rubino

    bot = rubino('auth')


Why Rubim ?
-----------

* *Having all the methods of Rubino*
* *Simple and complete document*
* *Appropriate speed*
